title: Removing dependencies on ax-13 (and ax-11)
content: It is known that ~ ax-13 is logically redundant (see ~ ax13w and the head comment of the section "Logical redundancy of ax-10--13"). More precisely, one can remove dependency on ~ ax-13 from every theorem in set.mm which is totally unbundled (i.e., has disjoint variable conditions on all setvar variables). Indeed, start with the existing proof, and replace any occurrence of ~ ax-13 with ~ ax13w . This section is an experiment to see in practice if (partially) unbundled versions of existing theorems can be proved more efficiently without ~ ax-13 (and using ~ ax6v / ~ ax6ev instead of ~ ax-6 / ~ ax6e , as is currently done). One reason to be optimistic is that the first few utility theorems using ~ ax-13 (roughly 200 of them) are then used mainly with dummy variables, which one can assume distinct from any other, so that the unbundled versions of the utility theorems suffice. In this section, we prove versions of theorems in the main part with dv conditions and not requiring ~ ax-13 , labeled bj-xxxv (we follow the proof of xxx but use ~ ax6v and ~ ax6ev instead of ~ ax-6 and ~ ax6e , and ~ ax-5 instead of ~ ax13v ; shorter proofs may be possible). When no additional dv condition is required, we label it bj-xxx. It is important to keep all the bundled theorems already in set.mm, but one may also add the (partially) unbundled versions which dipense with ~ ax-13 , so as to remove dependencies on ~ ax-13 from many existing theorems. UPDATE: it turns out that several theorems of the form bj-xxxv, or minor variations, are already in set.mm with label xxxw. It is also possible to remove dependencies on ~ ax-11 , typically by replacing a nonfree hypothesis with a disjoint variable condition (see ~ cbv3v2 and following theorems).

blocks.name: bj-cbv1v
blocks.content: Version of ~ cbv1 with a disjoint variable condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by BJ, 16-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-cbv1v(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wnf(s1, w1))
  -| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w2))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w1, w2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  pm2.86i(w0, wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2))
  3imtr3i(wi(w0, wal(s0, w1)), wi(w0, wal(s1, w2)), wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wal(s1, wi(w0, w2)))
  cbv3v(s0, s1, wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2))
  nfim1(s1, w0, w1)
  nfim1(s0, w0, w2)
  a2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0, w1, w2)
  com12(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0, wi(w1, w2))
  19.21(s0, w0, w1)
  19.21(s1, w0, w2)
}

blocks.name: bj-cbv1hv
blocks.content: Version of ~ cbv1h with a disjoint variable condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by BJ, 16-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-cbv1hv(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wi(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
  -| wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s1, w1)))
  -| wi(w0, wi(w2, wal(s0, w2)))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w1, w2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  bj-cbv1v(s0, s1, wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), w1, w2)
  nf5d(s1, wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), w1)
  nfa2(s1, s0, w0)
  syl(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wi(w1, wal(s1, w1)), w0)
  nf5d(s0, wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), w2)
  nfa1(s0, wal(s1, w0))
  syl(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wi(w2, wal(s0, w2)), w0)
  syl(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w1, w2)), w0)
  2sp(s0, s1, w0)
}

blocks.name: bj-cbv2hv
blocks.content: Version of ~ cbv2h with a disjoint variable condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by BJ, 16-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-cbv2hv(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wb(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
  -| wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s1, w1)))
  -| wi(w0, wi(w2, wal(s0, w2)))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  impbid(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2))
  bj-cbv1hv(s0, s1, w0, w1, w2)
  syl6(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w1, w2), wb(w1, w2))
  biimp(w1, w2)
  alcoms(s0, s1, w0, wi(wal(s1, w2), wal(s0, w1)))
  bj-cbv1hv(s1, s0, w0, w2, w1)
  syl56(w0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wi(w2, w1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2))
  equcomi(s1, s0)
  biimpr(w1, w2)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-cbv2hv(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0, ∀(s1, w0))→(∀(s0, w1)↔ ∀(s1, w2)))
  ⊣ (w0 →(w1 → ∀(s1, w1)))
  ⊣ (w0 →(w2 → ∀(s0, w2)))
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 = s1 →(w1 ↔ w2)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  impbid(∀(s0, ∀(s1, w0)), ∀(s0, w1), ∀(s1, w2))
  bj-cbv1hv(s0, s1, w0, w1, w2)
  syl6(w0, s0 = s1, (w1 → w2), (w1 ↔ w2))
  biimp(w1, w2)
  alcoms(s0, s1, w0, (∀(s1, w2)→ ∀(s0, w1)))
  bj-cbv1hv(s1, s0, w0, w2, w1)
  syl56(w0, s1 = s0, (w2 → w1), s0 = s1, (w1 ↔ w2))
  equcomi(s1, s0)
  biimpr(w1, w2)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: bj-cbvaldv
blocks.content: Version of ~ cbvald with a disjoint variable condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by BJ, 16-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-cbvaldv(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wnf(s1, w1))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
} = {
  bj-cbv2v(s0, s1, w0, w1, w2)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  a1i(w0, wnf(s0, w2))
  nfv(s0, w2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-cbvaldv(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(∀(s0, w1)↔ ∀(s1, w2)))
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → F/(s1, w1))
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 = s1 →(w1 ↔ w2)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w2)
} = {
  bj-cbv2v(s0, s1, w0, w1, w2)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  a1i(w0, F/(s0, w2))
  nfv(s0, w2)
}

blocks.name: bj-cbvexdv
blocks.content: Version of ~ cbvexd with a disjoint variable condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by BJ, 16-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-cbvexdv(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wex(s0, w1), wex(s1, w2)))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wnf(s1, w1))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, wex(s0, w1), wex(s1, w2), wn(wal(s0, wn(w1))), wn(wal(s1, wn(w2))))
  notbid(w0, wal(s0, wn(w1)), wal(s1, wn(w2)))
  bj-cbvaldv(s0, s1, w0, wn(w1), wn(w2))
  nfnd(s1, w0, w1)
  syl6ib(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wn(w1), wn(w2)), wb(w1, w2))
  notbi(w1, w2)
  df-ex(s0, w1)
  df-ex(s1, w2)
  diff.wn.s(s0, w2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-cbvexdv(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(∃(s0, w1)↔ ∃(s1, w2)))
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → F/(s1, w1))
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 = s1 →(w1 ↔ w2)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w2)
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, ∃(s0, w1), ∃(s1, w2), ¬ ∀(s0, ¬ w1), ¬ ∀(s1, ¬ w2))
  notbid(w0, ∀(s0, ¬ w1), ∀(s1, ¬ w2))
  bj-cbvaldv(s0, s1, w0, ¬ w1, ¬ w2)
  nfnd(s1, w0, w1)
  syl6ib(w0, s0 = s1, (¬ w1 ↔ ¬ w2), (w1 ↔ w2))
  notbi(w1, w2)
  df-ex(s0, w1)
  df-ex(s1, w2)
  diff.wn.s(s0, w2)
}

blocks.name: bj-cbval2v
blocks.content: Version of ~ cbval2 with a disjoint variable condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by BJ, 16-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-cbval2v(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(s2, wal(s3, w1)))
  -| wnf(s2, w0)
  -| wnf(s3, w0)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wnf(s1, w1)
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
} = {
  cbvalv1(s0, s2, wal(s1, w0), wal(s3, w1))
  nfal(s2, s1, w0)
  nfal(s0, s3, w1)
  pm5.74ri(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wal(s1, w0), wal(s3, w1))
  3bitr3i(wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wal(s1, w0)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wal(s3, w1)), wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), w0)), wal(s3, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), w1)))
  cbvalv1(s1, s3, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), w0), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), w1))
  nfim(s3, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), w0)
  nfv(s3, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))
  nfim(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), w1)
  nfv(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))
  pm5.74d(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), w0, w1)
  expcom(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wb(w0, w1))
  19.21v(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), w0)
  19.21v(s3, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s3, cv(s0), cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s2)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-cbval2v(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0, ∀(s1, w0))↔ ∀(s2, ∀(s3, w1)))
  ⊣ F/(s2, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s3, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w1)
  ⊣ F/(s1, w1)
  ⊣ ((s0 = s2 ∧ s1 = s3)→(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
} = {
  cbvalv1(s0, s2, ∀(s1, w0), ∀(s3, w1))
  nfal(s2, s1, w0)
  nfal(s0, s3, w1)
  pm5.74ri(s0 = s2, ∀(s1, w0), ∀(s3, w1))
  3bitr3i((s0 = s2 → ∀(s1, w0)), (s0 = s2 → ∀(s3, w1)), ∀(s1,(s0 = s2 → w0)), ∀(s3,(s0 = s2 → w1)))
  cbvalv1(s1, s3, (s0 = s2 → w0), (s0 = s2 → w1))
  nfim(s3, s0 = s2, w0)
  nfv(s3, s0 = s2)
  nfim(s1, s0 = s2, w1)
  nfv(s1, s0 = s2)
  pm5.74d(s1 = s3, s0 = s2, w0, w1)
  expcom(s1 = s3, s0 = s2, (w0 ↔ w1))
  19.21v(s1, s0 = s2, w0)
  19.21v(s3, s0 = s2, w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s3, s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s2)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: bj-cbvex2v
blocks.content: Version of ~ cbvex2 with a disjoint variable condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by BJ, 16-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

thm bj-cbvex2v(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, w0)), wex(s2, wex(s3, w1)))
  -| wnf(s2, w0)
  -| wnf(s3, w0)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wnf(s1, w1)
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wex(s0, wex(s1, w0)), wex(s2, wex(s3, w1)), wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wn(w0)))), wn(wal(s2, wal(s3, wn(w1)))))
  notbii(wal(s0, wal(s1, wn(w0))), wal(s2, wal(s3, wn(w1))))
  bj-cbval2v(s0, s1, s2, s3, wn(w0), wn(w1))

  nfn(s0, w1)

  2exnaln(s2, s3, w1)

blocks.origin:
thm bj-cbvex2vv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, w0)), wex(s2, wex(s3, w1)))

  |- wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0)))), diffsw(s2, w0))
  mpbi(wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0)))), wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0)))))))
  mpg(hs0, wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0)))))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))
  bj-axrep5(hs0, s2, s0, s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0))
  nfv(s0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0))
  bj-spimevv(s0, hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  a1d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  alrimiv(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wi(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  adantrd(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  syl6(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  equtr(s0, hs0, s1)
  equcomi(s0, s1)
  exbii(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0))))), wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0))))
  albii(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0)))), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0)))
  bibi2i(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0))
  bitr3i(wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0), wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), w0))))
  exbii(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), w0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0)))
  an12(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), w0)
  equsexvw(hs0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), w0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))
  elequ1(hs0, s1, s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0))

thm bj-axsep(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ∃(s0, ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ↔(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ w0))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(∃(s0, ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ↔(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ w0)))), d(s2, w0))
  mpbi(∃(s0, ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ↔(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ w0)))), ∃(s0, ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ↔ ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s2 ∧(hs0 = s1 ∧ w0)))))))
  mpg(hs0, ∃(s0, ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ↔ ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s2 ∧(hs0 = s1 ∧ w0)))))), (hs0 ∈ s2 → ∃(s0, ∀(s1,((hs0 = s1 ∧ w0)→ s1 = s0)))))
  bj-axrep5(hs0, s2, s0, s1, (hs0 = s1 ∧ w0))
  nfv(s0, (hs0 = s1 ∧ w0))
  bj-spimevv(s0, hs0, hs0 ∈ s2, ∀(s1,((hs0 = s1 ∧ w0)→ s1 = s0)))
  a1d(s0 = hs0, hs0 ∈ s2, ∀(s1,((hs0 = s1 ∧ w0)→ s1 = s0)))
  alrimiv(s1, s0 = hs0, ((hs0 = s1 ∧ w0)→ s1 = s0))
  adantrd(s0 = hs0, hs0 = s1, w0, s1 = s0)
  syl6(s0 = hs0, hs0 = s1, s1 = s0, s0 = s1)
  equtr(s0, hs0, s1)
  equcomi(s0, s1)
  exbii(s0, ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ↔ ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s2 ∧(hs0 = s1 ∧ w0))))), ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ↔(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ w0))))
  albii(s1, (s1 ∈ s0 ↔ ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s2 ∧(hs0 = s1 ∧ w0)))), (s1 ∈ s0 ↔(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ w0)))
  bibi2i(s1 ∈ s0, ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s2 ∧(hs0 = s1 ∧ w0))), (s1 ∈ s2 ∧ w0))
  bitr3i(∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s2 ∧(hs0 = s1 ∧ w0))), (s1 ∈ s2 ∧ w0), ∃(hs0,(hs0 = s1 ∧(hs0 ∈ s2 ∧ w0))))
  exbii(hs0, (hs0 = s1 ∧(hs0 ∈ s2 ∧ w0)), (hs0 ∈ s2 ∧(hs0 = s1 ∧ w0)))
  an12(hs0 = s1, hs0 ∈ s2, w0)
  equsexvw(hs0, s1, (hs0 ∈ s2 ∧ w0), (s1 ∈ s2 ∧ w0))
  anbi1d(hs0 = s1, hs0 ∈ s2, w0, s1 ∈ s2)
  elequ1(hs0, s1, s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs0 = s1, w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w((s1 ∈ s2 ∧ w0))
}

thm bj-el(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wex(s0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  eximii(s0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wal(hs0, wi(wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  zfpow(s0, hs0, s1)
  spimvw(hs0, s1, wi(wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  embantd(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  alrimiv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  ax9(hs0, s1, s0)
  ax8(hs0, s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

thm bj-el(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  ⊢ ∃(s0, s1 ∈ s0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  eximii(s0, s1 ∈ s0, ∀(hs0,(∀(s0,(s0 ∈ hs0 → s0 ∈ s1))→ hs0 ∈ s0)))
  zfpow(s0, hs0, s1)
  spimvw(hs0, s1, (∀(s0,(s0 ∈ hs0 → s0 ∈ s1))→ hs0 ∈ s0), s1 ∈ s0)
  embantd(hs0 = s1, ∀(s0,(s0 ∈ hs0 → s0 ∈ s1)), hs0 ∈ s0, s1 ∈ s0)
  alrimiv(s0, hs0 = s1, (s0 ∈ hs0 → s0 ∈ s1))
  ax9(hs0, s1, s0)
  ax8(hs0, s1, s0)

  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

thm bj-dtru(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  mpbi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wex(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  ax-mp(wex(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  ax-mp(wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))))))
  mpbir2an(wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))))), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wex(hs1, wn(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))))
  bj-el(hs0, s0)
  eximii(hs1, wn(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs1))), wal(s0, wn(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))))
  ax-nul(hs1, s0)
  sp(s0, wn(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs1))))
  exdistrv(hs0, hs1, wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs1))))
  2eximi(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))), wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  con3dimp(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  com12(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))
  ax9(hs0, hs1, s0)
  exlimivv(hs0, hs1, wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wex(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  pm2.61i(wi(wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wex(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1)))
  syl6bi(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wex(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  equequ2(hs1, s1, hs0)
  bj-spimevv(s0, hs0, wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  con3d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  ax7(s0, hs0, s1)
  a1d(wn(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1))), wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wex(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  bj-spimevv(s0, hs1, wn(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1))), wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  con3d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  ax7(s0, hs1, s1)
  exnal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.w(wn(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs0.w(wex(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  diff.hs1.w(wex(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  diff.wn.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wn.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)

  diff.hs1.s(s0)

thm bj-dtru(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  ⊢ ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  mpbi(¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), ∃(s0, ¬ s0 = s1))
  ax-mp(∃(s0, ¬ s0 = s1), ∃(hs0, ∃(hs1, ¬ hs0 = hs1)))
  ax-mp(∃(hs0, ∃(hs1, ¬ hs0 = hs1)), ∃(hs0, ∃(hs1,(s0 ∈ hs0 ∧ ¬ s0 ∈ hs1))))
  mpbir2an(∃(hs0, ∃(hs1,(s0 ∈ hs0 ∧ ¬ s0 ∈ hs1))), ∃(hs0, s0 ∈ hs0), ∃(hs1, ¬ s0 ∈ hs1))
  bj-el(hs0, s0)
  eximii(hs1, ¬ s0 ∈ hs1, ∀(s0, ¬ s0 ∈ hs1))
  ax-nul(hs1, s0)
  sp(s0, ¬ s0 ∈ hs1)
  exdistrv(hs0, hs1, s0 ∈ hs0, ¬ s0 ∈ hs1)
  2eximi(hs0, hs1, (s0 ∈ hs0 ∧ ¬ s0 ∈ hs1), ¬ hs0 = hs1)
  con3dimp(s0 ∈ hs0, s0 ∈ hs1, hs0 = hs1)
  com12(s0 ∈ hs0, hs0 = hs1, s0 ∈ hs1)
  ax9(hs0, hs1, s0)
  exlimivv(hs0, hs1, ¬ hs0 = hs1, ∃(s0, ¬ s0 = s1))
  pm2.61i((¬ hs0 = hs1 → ∃(s0, ¬ s0 = s1)), hs1 = s1)
  syl6bi(hs1 = s1, ¬ hs0 = hs1, ∃(s0, ¬ s0 = s1), ¬ hs0 = s1)
  notbid(hs1 = s1, hs0 = hs1, hs0 = s1)
  equequ2(hs1, s1, hs0)
  bj-spimevv(s0, hs0, ¬ hs0 = s1, ¬ s0 = s1)
  con3d(s0 = hs0, hs0 = s1, s0 = s1)
  ax7(s0, hs0, s1)
  a1d(¬ hs1 = s1, ¬ hs0 = hs1, ∃(s0, ¬ s0 = s1))
  bj-spimevv(s0, hs1, ¬ hs1 = s1, ¬ s0 = s1)
  con3d(s0 = hs1, hs1 = s1, s0 = s1)
  ax7(s0, hs1, s1)
  exnal(s0, s0 = s1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.w(¬ s0 ∈ hs1)
  diff.hs1.w(s0 ∈ hs0)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0, ¬ s0 = s1))
  diff.hs1.w(∃(s0, ¬ s0 = s1))
  diff.wn.s(s0, hs0 = s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wn.s(s0, hs1 = s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

} = {
  3imtr4i(weu(s0, w0), wex(s0, wn(w0)), wex(hs0, wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))), wn(wal(s0, w0)))

  mtbiri(wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wal(s0, w0), wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))

  eu6(s0, hs0, w0)
  exnal(s0, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wn(wal(s0, w0)))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
